Question: How to read a file line by line in Java? :I have a file that contains a list of names and their corresponding salaries. I want to read the file line by line and print the names and their salaries. I have tried using BufferedReader but I am not sure how to read the file line by line.
Please using this api: FileReader.readLine.
Answer:<<<api>>>: FileReader.readLine
<<<code>>>: BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("C:/temp/file.txt"));
while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
    System.out.println(line);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the readLine() method of BufferedReader to read the file line by line.
